title: Superman 1978 3h Extended Broadcast Edition VHSrip [MULVAcoded]
description:
Superman 1978 3h Extended Broadcast Edition VHSrip x264-[MULVAcoded] 
http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0078346
IMDB rating : 7.3

Stars: Christopher Reeve, Margot Kidder, Gene Hackman
Plot : An alien orphan is sent from his dying planet to Earth, where he grows up to become his adoptive home's first and greatest superhero.

This is the 3 hour long extended broadcast edition as aired on ABC on February 8, 1982. This was never released on DVD/home video hence the TV recording. Commercials have been cut out. This version has about 30 minutes longer runtime then the extended version released on DVD/Bluray.

For more details on this extended version read: 
https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Superman_%281978_film%29#Broadcast_television_version_details
